official_title: A bill to promote additional export sales of agricultural commodities, through an export credit revolving fund, in a least direct proportion to acreage reduction efforts and to establish authority for bonus commodity export sales.

summary.text: Agricultural Export Recovery Act of 1983 - Establishes within the Commodity Credit Corporation (CCC) an Agricultural Export Sales Revolving Fund which shall be available to promote agricultural commodity exports. Makes available to the Fund an amount equal to the total amount of payments made to producers, or projected to be made, under the land diversion programs for the 1983 crops of wheat, feed grains, upland cotton, and rice. Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to make commodities owned by the CCC available for export in order to encourage increased commercial exports of agricultural commodities.

titles.title: A bill to promote additional export sales of agricultural commodities, through an export credit revolving fund, in a least direct proportion to acreage reduction efforts and to establish authority for bonus commodity export sales.
